text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 765. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Razer Blade RZ09-01021101-R3U1 14.0" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4702HQ (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 765M 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 8.1 Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Razer Blade RZ09-01021101-R3U1 14.0" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4702HQ (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 765M 8 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 8.1 Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
